name: 5 Minutes Until Self-Destruction
summary: The self-destruction sequence has been activated. You have 5 minutes to solve your way out of a high-stakes, escape room-style disaster.

name: 5 More Minutes
summary: Fight against insomnia to get a good night's rest.

name: 5 Minutes: DLC Final
summary: A collection of new tracks designed not to comfort but to intensify the void.

name: 5 Minutes: DLC 2
summary: Welcome back to the cycle. It hasn't become easier. It has only become deeper. 5 Minutes: Echo of Persistence Continue. Suffer. Record your fall. And try, once again, to reach the unreachable.

name: 5 Minutes: DLC 1
summary: 5 Minutes grants no comfort. Grants no rest. Grants no forgiveness. It is a game for those unafraid to fall a thousand times, for those who see defeat not as failure, but as an invitation. For those who seek the glory of challenging the impossible, even if they never reach it.

name: 5 Minutes
summary: 5 Minutes grants no comfort. Grants no rest. Grants no forgiveness. It is a game for those unafraid to fall a thousand times, for those who see defeat not as failure, but as an invitation. For those who seek the glory of challenging the impossible, even if they never reach it.

name: 5 Min Space Battle
summary: 5Min Space Battle is a fast-paced third-person space shooter. Pilot different fighters through intense battles, eliminate enemy threats, and level up your fighter to boost its performance. Each fighter has unique combat capabilities, defining your playstyle in thrilling 5-minute skirmishes.

name: 5 Minute Raid
summary: A boss raid where the boss is also a player!A team of 3 guardians. 6 classes 12 perksAn abomination from the 3rd dimension, ready to singlehandedly destroy the worldOnly 5 minutes until the destruction of the 2nd dimension!A casual quirky 1 vs 3 asymmetrical PvP experience: 5 Minute Raid!

name: 5 Minutes to Kill
summary: 5 Minutes to Kill is a speed mapping project where every consecutive map in the set gets 5 more minutes of mapping time. Starting at 5 minutes with MAP1, 10 minutes with MAP02, 15 minutes with MAP03, etc. The levels are organized by mapping time, NOT by difficulty, and the mapset is also a bit of a variety pack, with gameplay ranging from classic techbases, to combat challenges, to slaughter.

name: 5-min-Clue
summary: 5-min-Clue is small one-player RPG about being an amateur detective that somehow keeps getting involved in murder mysteries. There's no puzzle to solve, the die will tell you who, where, and how; you will have to think quick about the why, and deliver a summation worthy of the best amateur sleuths. Or not, just have fun.

name: 5 Minutes Rage
summary:
A sport with simple rules: kill suckers, catch the ball and score.

5 Minutes Rage is a 2.5D multiplayer game where two team of robots (junkbots) clash in a battle of cannon shots to bring the ball to the goal. It features a frantic gameplay with 5 minutes matches, 2vs2 or 1vs1, in online or local mode.

name: 5 Minute Climb
summary: 5 minutes to jump to the top. Fall and it's back to the start.

name: 5 Minutes to Kill Yourself
summary: Stan is in hell. He lives the day-in, day-out workaday life of a cube jockey. A last-minute meeting request pushes him over the edge. As Stan, you wander the office space finding ingenious ways to hurt him until Stan's health is completely drained. He has but five minutesâ€”if he can't do it by then, he's doomed to sit through yet another boring meeting. You're Stan's only hope.

name: 5 Minutes until Goodbye
summary:
In 5 Minutes until Goodbye you'll only have 5 minutes to properly say goodbye in a train station.

Discover different activities and unlock many dialogues!

Will you use your time wisely...?

name: 5 Minutes to Burn Something!
summary: You burnt some toast, which set off your smoke alarm and called the fire department. If there's not a fire when they arrive, you can expect a hefty fine.
